sim: Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Hybrid Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)
display_c:
- 100% DCI-P3 coverage
  - Dolby Vision/HDR10 compliant
  - Always-on display
  - LG UX
card_slot: microSD, up to 400 GB (uses SIM 2 slot) - dual SIM model only
sound_c:
- 32-bit/192kHz audio
  - Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic
wlan: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA, hotspot
messaging: SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email, IM
features_c:
- Wireless charging
  - Fast battery charging: 50% in 30 min (Quick Charge 3.0)
  - MP4/DviX/XviD/H.265 player
  - MP3/WAV/FLAC/eAAC+ player
  - Photo/video editor
  - Document editor
sensors: Fingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
cpu: Octa-core (4x2.8 GHz Kryo 385 Gold & 4x1.7 GHz Kryo 385 Silver)
internal: 128 GB, 6 GB RAM or 64 GB, 4 GB RAM
body_c:
- IP68 certified - dust/water proof (up to 1.5m for 30 mins)
  - MIL-STD-810G compliant
primary_: Dual: 16 MP, f/1.5, OIS, phase detection autofocus, LED flash
features: Geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, HDR
